name: Missed Holidays
query:
select selected_date as 'Date::100', dayname(selected_date) as 'Description::300' from (
select adddate(concat(%(year)s, '-01-01'),t2*100 + t1*10 + t0) selected_date from 
 (select 0 t0 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t0,
 (select 0 t1 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t1,
 (select 0 t2 union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t2) x
 where year(selected_date)=%(year)s and dayname(selected_date)=%(holiday_name)s 
 and not selected_date in (select holiday_date from `tabHoliday` where parent=%(holiday_list)s)
